column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've been here many times throughout the past few years and have always had a good dining experience.  Tapas and sangria are what shine here
column2: so plan on spending at least an hour here and ordering to share!   I've gone with and without reservations
column3: and have never had to wait long for a table to open up.  There is a really nice bar area
column4: so it's nice to sit there and have a drink before being seated.
